Consortium Publications Communications GAs Intranet

Intranet

Acknowledgments

Any publication from the consortium should acknowledge the project funding as follows:

This study has received funding from Agence Nationale de la Recherche - France 2030 as part of the PEPR TRACCS programme under grand number ANR-22-EXTR-0008

or in French

Ce travail a bénéficié d’une aide de l’État gérée par l’Agence National de la Recherche au titre de France 2030 portant la référence ANR-22-EXTR-0008

The following logos should be used in any communications:

Adding publications on HAL

When you add your publication on the HAL platform, please do mention ANR-22-EXTR-0008 under “Projet(s) ANR” in the funding section.

Mailing list

All people involved in IMPRESSION-ESM, or wanting to stay inform about IMPRESSION-ESM activities, may join the project mailing list traccs-pc7@ipsl.fr. To do so, send an email to sympa@listes.ipsl.fr with the subject line “subscribe traccs-pc7”. To unsubscribe, process similarly with “unsubscribe traccs-pc7” in the subject line. You may also use the web interface, if you already have an account on this server.

Project documents

The project documents are accessible only upon request to Romain Roehrig:

  • Scientific description
  • Data Management Plan, initial version
  • Science Steering Committee reports:
    • 15 December 2023: Discussion document
    • 6 June 2024: Discussion document, Report
    • 28 November 2024: Discussion document, Report
    • 6 March 2025

Contribute to the website

This website is updated through github (https://github.com/orgs/IMPRESSION-ESM). You can send content by email to Romain Roehrig, or fork the repository and do pull requests.

  • contact: romain.roehrig@meteo.fr
